environment_understanding.description: The ability to understand the provided environment description and identify relevant objects.

action_selection.description: The ability to select a valid action from the given available actions.

planning_capability.description: The ability to plan future actions based on the current condition and environment feedback.

task_accomplishment.description: The ability to accomplish the assigned task within the environment.

efficient_solution.description: The ability to solve the task in an efficient manner, using minimal unnecessary actions.

format_adherence.description: The ability to strictly follow the output format for THOUGHT and ACTION.

terminating_condition.description: The ability to terminate the interaction with the environment only when appropriate based on task instructions.
